data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22333, Version Hash: 76f317c0de4b335c5f692213a60f2fe4d1679c4e
data.actual_result: Discord scrolled to the top of the voice and textchannels, even if you have a textchannel at the bottom selected
data.expected_result: You should still be at the bottom of the channels (or at least at the position of the selected one)
data.short_description: Discord scrolls to the top of voice/textchannel in a guild, when switching to DMs and back
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll to the bottom of the voice and textchannel - switch to DMs (Either by directly clicking on the indicator or by just clicking on home) - go back to the guild
